name: Christmas Village
description:
Christmas Village is a game where you control 2 characters and you can throw snowballs. You can play it by yourself or with someone else and control one character each. I recommend using a Gamepad but Keyboard works too, you can even use both if you're playing 2 player.

Controls

Keyboard

p1: wasd, and e to shoot

p2: arrow keys, right ctrl to shoot

Gamepad

p1: left stick and L1/LB to shoot

p2: right stick and R1/RB to shoot

This game was created in a week for the GDN Big Festive Game Jam where the theme was 'surprise'.
